net.tridentsdk.server.netty

Class Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.netty.Codec

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class Codec
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to help decode the bytes from a backed buffer serializer
